petri.api
Class SoundPlayer

java.lang.Object
  petri.api.SoundPlayer

public class SoundPlayer
extends java.lang.Object

A controller that allows the user to easily load and manage sounds in queues. Sounds can be played instantly, or added to a queue. The queue will play one sound after another until it runs out of available sounds to play. The queues are managed by an ArrayList, and are thus only limited in number to the max size of ArrayList.

Author:
Cody Swendrowski
